title: Tolstoy Therapy: A Fiction Prescription
description: When you're struggling with fears, worries, challenging situations or difficult moods, you may well turn to therapy, self-help, alternative therapies or medication. However, the solution may already be in your home, stacked neatly on your bookshelves. There is a book out there to help everyone get through difficult feelings and situations in life; you just need a little help finding it.
author: Lucy Horner
